summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Capitol Hill Housing Improvement Program (CHHIP), a public corporation chartered by The City of Seattle, authorizing the Director of the Office of Housing to enter into an agreement with King County, consenting to a request from CHHIP to develop an affordable housing project located in the White Center neighborhood of unincorporated King County, and extending the City's powers, authorities and rights regarding public corporations and authorities beyond the city limits for that project.
